entity.description: Conversation about the Supreme Court and justices

text: @realDonaldTrump Maybe Mr. Trump the Supreme Court is following the real law and not your interpretation of the law. Who knows how you think? You won’t even listen to the scientists and expert doctors regarding the spread of the Coronavirus. You are willing to kill people with your rallies.
